parameters.name: autoSnapshotPolicyId
parameters.description: The ID of the automatic snapshot policy. You can call the [DescribeAutoSnapshotPolicyEx](~~25530~~) operation to query the IDs of available automatic snapshot policies.

parameters.name: regionId
parameters.description: The ID of the region to which the automatic snapshot policy belongs. You can call the [DescribeRegions](~~25609~~) operation to query the most recent region list.
